characteristics.climate: Cold, windy, with significant temperature variations
characteristics.vegetation: Grasses, dwarf shrubs, and alpine flowers
elements: Ice Frozen essence of winter, wielder of chilling touch and frostbite.
Air Invisible force of life, carrier of whispers and secrets.
Earth Immovable foundation, embodying strength and permanence.
Wood Silent witness of time, carrier of life's cycle of growth and decay.
Water Flowing lifeblood of the world, master of adaptation and change.
Storm Chaotic fusion of wind, water, and lightning, bringer of change.
Iron Unyielding resilience, testament to strength and endurance.
